ComicInfo.Summary:
Mark and his friend William go out for college orientation. While they're there, a Reaniman attacks the campus, forcing Invincible to stop it. The cyborg impales itself soon after challenged by Invincible, leaving Invincible non the wiser as to what it was after.
Later Omni-Man and Invincible are called out to Art: Looks like a power suit is missing. The prime suspect is Black Samson - the suit's potential owner and an ex-member of Guardians of the Globe. Samson's been a bit strange of late, ever since losing his powers he's been desperate to get the suit functional so that he can rejoin the Guardians.
Meanwhile it looks like the Teen Team will be breaking up: Robot's been offered a position with the Guaridans.
